title: Will UK version of Pixel 4a get a full 3 years of guaranteed security updates from UK release date?
content:
The Pixel 4a launched in the US on 20th August 2020.
It is not due to launch in the UK until October 2020.
The Google support page states the phone will be supported until August 2020. This means that in the UK we will get less than the expected 3 years of guaranteed security updates.
Can someone at Google clarify the support period for UK Pixel 4a devices?
Thank you
